indicator.summary: Moving Average Envelopes is a price band overlay that is offset from the moving average of Close price over a lookback window. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Moving average type (e.g. EMA, HMA, TEMA, etc.).
indicator.returns: Time series of MA Envelopes values.
